summary: Consumer roll-in for standard run: schema drift guard, DQ thresholds, and monitoring alerts.

directives.details: Ingest Toyfoundry standard run exports; verify SHA256 from export_manifest.json.
Validate schema_version=v1.0 and enforce field/type/nullability/enum invariants; fail if drift detected.
Apply thresholds for non_empty, allowed_rituals/status, units_positive, duration_ms_range; record failures and remediation steps.
Set lightweight alerts for ingestion failure or schema drift; document channel and oncall/owner.
Submit acceptance report to exchange/reports/inbox/order-2025-10-15-021-report.json with metrics, thresholds, and alert config.
